images.caption: Figure 1:The architecture of PVPO. Reference model updatesRrefR^{\text{ref}}at fixed steps, maintaining value stability and improving the performance lower bound. Reward manager do not restrict the generation of reward.
Figure 2:Training efficiency study of PVPO on mathematical reasoning datasets.

Figure 3:Group Sampling study on datasets from different fields. The Acc is the mean of the answer accuracies from M trajectories rolled out by the reference model.
M=5 in Figure (a) and M=16 in Figure (b).
Figure 4:Training stability study of PVPO on multi-step retrieval datasets.
Figure 5:Low sampling budget study of PVPO on multi-step retrieval datasets. TheNNdenotes the number of trajectories in each single rollout.NN=5 is the full budget andNN=2 is the low budget.
